paragraghs.line: There are three main types of business entities that require tax filings, including sole proprietorships, partnerships, and corporations.

points: Electronic filing for T5013 Partnership Information Return

paragraghs.line: Our corporate tax services provide great and desired outcomes. Please contact us anytime to discuss what your situations are.
